full_text:

On Mon, Apr 26, 2010 at 1:24 PM, bulletbabea <bulletbabea@...> wrote:

>
>
> Please follow the rules for posting files. I spent the morning cleaning out
> wav files to clear up space and those postings just took up over 23% of the
> groups file storage space because you used wav format and not mp3. If you
> must post wav format or tons of files use esnips or attach to email posts as
> file attachment. Group storage is limited.
>
